description: Each month we showcase the individuals and small businesses that we support with online accounting services.
name: Client of the Month
yoast_head:

<title>Client of the Month Showcase | The Accountancy Partnership</title>
<meta name="description" content="We highlight some of the small businesses that we support with our accountancy services, where they share their experiences with running their own business." />
